author: Kris Holt
title: The 10th-gen Apple iPad is at its lowest price ever in an Amazon Black Friday deal
description:
There’s a good iPad
 deal to be found if you're looking for an entry-level model. The 10th-generation iPad has dropped to its lowest price ever. The 64GB WiFi variant is down to $349 for Black Friday. That's $100 off and $30 less than the previous low. You c…
